title: Painting

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Stand in front of a player's door. All of those player's visitors will instead target your second target. Coven members aren't affected because they'll simply use the back door.
- With the Necronomicon, you can stand in front of someone's door, but facing the inside. They go to a different world (and no longer exist).

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: - When facing the inside of someone's house, their visitors are unaffected, since they'll think the door is barricaded, and instead smash a window.

desc:
Post 3779
*Wait, you're saying we should let in a fucking painting? Our standards have gone so low these days...*
